amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 113-340 to prevent provisions of the bill from taking effect until it has been determined that it will not interfere with the State of California's Delta and water management reform and funding Acts of 2009, including SB7x-1, SB7x-2, SB7x-6, and SB7x-7.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 231 (Roll no. 46).
